text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Daiwa Scarlet—an Umamusume with<n>an intense fixation on
being number<n>one.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That's why her second-place finish<n>at the tryouts came as
a shock,<n>planting seeds of doubt within her. If<n>that's the
case...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: You want me to have a rematch with<n>Vodka?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
...So I can get my revenge for the<n>tryouts? What's the point
in that?
choice_data_list: Let's take back your spot as number one.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: You serious?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I'm on board, but it won't be easy.You do have a plan, I hope?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Maybe you want me to save my<n>energy for the end instead
of running<n>at the front? Sorry, but some<n>makeshift plan
like that won't be<n>enough against her.
choice_data_list:
I want you to run one furlong farther in front
than usual.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Some trainer you are! Have youever heard of "stamina management?" Anyone rushing to thefront like that is guaranteed to burn out!
choice_data_list: You're not just anyone though, you're number one.
You're not just anyone though, you're number one.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Ugh...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Ughhh fine! We'll do it your way. I<n>just have to do it, don't
I?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Well don't just stand there—there'straining to be done! You didprepare a training menu to build upmy stamina, riiight?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I'm warning you—your regimen better<n>be up to par, or you'll
regret it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, Scarlet and I spend the next<n>few days completely
absorbed in<n>building up her stamina. Before long,<n>the day
of the race is upon us...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hm? If it isn't Air Groove! Yoohoo!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Teio... So you also came to watch.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: When I heard about a one-on-onebetween Scarlet and Vodka, I justknew I had to see it! Hey, lookslike they're gonna start!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah, and what of it?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Actually—

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Scarlet. You ready yet?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...I am.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Well, I'm off. You better keep your<n>eyes glued to me,
Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It's finally time—the rematch against<n>Vodka begins!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Hah!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Scarlet's out front! Is she going<n>with the same strategy
as last time?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
But didn't this also happen at the<n>tryouts? If this keeps up,
won't Vodka<n>pass her at the final stretch again?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
No, wait. It appears that things aren't<n>the same as they
once were.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Now!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Wai—

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Wha—she's going for her last spurt<n>this early?! She barely
made it across<n>the finish line last time, and you're<n>telling
me she's gonna keep this up<n>'til the end?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: You're right. It's a reckless<n>maneuver. However!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: (Back then, I couldn't become<n>number one.)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
(My bluff was called, my pride—torn to<n>pieces. I drowned in
self-pity, knowing<n>full well how pathetic I was.)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
(Even now... I'm still suffering! My<n>body's hot! My throat
hurts! I can't<n>feel my legs! Still—)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Tch... Augh! Why... why!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Why... can't I catch up to her?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: (—I want to win! I NEED to win!Nobody's going to be numberone—except for me!)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
(I know that maybe I'm just being<n>way too stubborn... But
that's fine!)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Right now, let me show you just how<n>pigheaded I can really
be! Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Scarlet!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Heh. Don't think it's gon' be that<n>easy! Yaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Daiwa Scarlet wrings out the last of<n>her energy as Vodka
closes in. The<n>winner is—

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Bravo, Daiwa Scarlet.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... I... won?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Aughhh, dammit! I actually<n>lost—maaan!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Vodka...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hmph. Hey, don't go thinkin' things<n>are over.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Got it? Next time, I'm settlin' the<n>score! I won't lose... honor
student!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
...Hehe. I like your attitude—I'll be<n>waiting! The number one
spot will<n>always belong to me!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Isn't that right, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It looks like my days of aiming to be<n>number one with
Daiwa Scarlet have<n>only begun.
